document_name: GFATM Round 4 Malaria Grant in Zambia - PRODOC.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/ZMB/00061463/GFATM Round 4 Malaria Grant in Zambia - PRODOC.pdf

donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr:
- Managing the supply chain system of Coartem up to the level of health facilities to ensure that 100% of all health facilities have no stock out lasting more than one week.
- Treatment of 4,920, 000 malaria cases (clinical and confirmed) at health facilities.
- Distribution of 1,931,810 Rapid Diagnostic Tests (RDTs) to health facilities.
- Ensuring that at least 35% of all fever cases among suspected malaria cases are confirmed with RDTs.
- Distribution of 1,754,815 LLITNNs to beneficiaries.

project_descr: Round 4 Malaria Grant Phase 2 NCE - Scaling up of Equitable and Sustainable Interventions for Malaria Prevention and Control in Zambia
project_title: GFATM Round 4 Malaria Grant in Zambia
